known_issues: Account creation/signup attempt results in nothing happening (no error shown).

existing_features.title: Update the React email/password auth hook to match the backend’s actual return types for `signup`, `login`, `validateSession`, and `logout`, and ensure all failures surface a user-visible error in the login/signup modal (no silent failures).

Regenerate/update the frontend backend-actor type declarations so the compiled frontend actor type includes the newly supported `signup`, `login`, `validateSession`, and `logout` methods (eliminating runtime mismatches between declared and deployed canister interfaces).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the Motoko backend email/password authentication API so the actor exposes `signup`, `login`, `validateSession`, and `logout` methods with stable, structured return types compatible with the frontend’s expectations (i.e., Result-style responses that include a session token and user info on success, and an error message on failure).

projectName: Fix email/password signup doing nothing by aligning frontend auth calls with backend actor methods
